jabber.lop.Farm

type
class
available in
neko, js, flash, php, node
Manages the spawning of virtual machines. Linked Process Protocol Linked Process Website The disco 'identity' of a farm MUST be of category="client" and type="bot" (name is up to the implementation).

Constructor

new(stream : jabber.Stream, ?password : String, ?vm_species : String, ?vm_time_to_live : Float, ?job_timeout : Float)
